title: Handle a Bounced Rent Check (NSF)
description: A tenant's rent check has been returned for Non-Sufficient Funds (NSF). The PM must take corrective action.

tasks.description: Receive the NSF notification from the bank and identify the tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the tenant and the returned payment amount.

tasks.description: Reverse the original rent payment on the tenant's ledger.
tasks.expected_outcome: The tenant's payment is removed, making their rent show as unpaid.

tasks.description: Apply the standard NSF fee and late fee to the tenant's account, and notify the tenant they must now pay with certified funds.
tasks.expected_outcome: The NSF and late fees are charged, and a notice is sent to the tenant with new payment instructions.
